house_listing.house_description: This single family home built in 1985 has 4 bedroom(s), 3 full bath(s)/1 half bath(s) , 3 car garage. Rooms include dining room, family room, master bedroom. Features include view, private pool, patio, fireplace.
house_listing.firm_name: Coldwell Banker Success Realty Coldwell Banker Success Realty
